img_above_text:
![Foothills Walkthrough \(21\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f0/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2821%29.png)
The biggest change from here on out is that it introduces a fiery unicycle into the mix. This will make it easier for him to move around the arena, but he'll also kick it out and send this to attack you independently. When this is introduced, he'll be able to burn you.
img_below_text:
The problem with this attack is there are two types of heavy attacks he'll perform here and they can be hard to avoid.
![Foothills Walkthrough \(22\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/8d/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2822%29.png)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Foothills Walkthrough \(21\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f0/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2821%29.png)
The biggest change from here on out is that it introduces a fiery unicycle into the mix. This will make it easier for him to move around the arena, but he'll also kick it out and send this to attack you independently. When this is introduced, he'll be able to burn you."
        - Following Text: "The problem with this attack is there are two types of heavy attacks he'll perform here and they can be hard to avoid.
![Foothills Walkthrough \(22\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/8d/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2822%29.png)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a dynamic battle scene in a rocky, forested arena. A fiery, glowing creature (possibly the boss) is shown mid-attack, surrounded by red sparks and flames, while the player character, armed and armored, prepares to engage. The context suggests this is part of a challenging phase where the boss uses fire-based attacks, including a fiery unicycle, to increase mobility and deal damage.
